
# Lemon Way 
![lemonway](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/lemonway/logo.png?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `lemonway` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] Lemon Way 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  Lemon Way is a Payment Institution dedicated to E-commerce websites, CrowdFunding platforms, Marketplaces and FinTech companies looking for payment processing, wallet management and third-party payment in a KYC/AML-regulated framework. 600 European companies use its service, generating a yearly cash flow of â‚¬700m (est. 2016).
